content:
Hi all, is there anyone offering commercial support/consultancy for the open source IBM FHIR Server (so something like Smile CDR for HAPI)?
Thx!

IBM will provide enterprise support for the IBM FHIR Server. We also have a consulting arm that works with many payers and providers on interop, analytics, and much more. Let us know what we could help with.
Please follow up with me in a private message to discuss what we can help you with.
